LanguageData.KotORLD_ExtractTibannaDesc: Extract 10 Tibanna from the tank. A pawn will come to extract it.
LanguageData.KotORLD_ExtractRhydoniumDesc: Extract 75 Rhydonium from the tank. A pawn will come to extract it.
LanguageData.KotORLD_TibannaValveDesc: Switches Tibanna flow on/off. A pawn will come open/close the valve.
LanguageData.KotORLD_RhydoniumValveDesc: Switches Rhydonium flow on/off. A pawn will come open/close the valve.
